name: Validate Post on Save
description: Validates blog post front matter, images, attribution, and reading time when saving posts

action.message:
I just saved a post. Please validate:
1. Front matter is complete (title, date, image, tags, description)
2. Image file exists in /img/
3. Unsplash attribution is present at end of post
4. Reading time is under 10 minutes (~2,500 words)
5. Code blocks have language tags

Report any issues found.
